Defines

#define NULL   0
#define N(arr)   (sizeof(arr) / sizeof(*arr))
#define SAFE_DELETE(ptr)   if (ptr != NULL) { delete ptr; ptr = NULL; }
#define SAFE_DELETE_WITH_ELEMENTS(arrPtr, arrSize)
#define SAFE_REPLACE(dst, src)

Define Documentation

#define N ( arr   )     (sizeof(arr) / sizeof(*arr))

#define NULL   0

#define SAFE_DELETE ( ptr   )     if (ptr != NULL) { delete ptr; ptr = NULL; }

#define SAFE_DELETE_WITH_ELEMENTS ( arrPtr,
arrSize   ) 

Value:

do {    \
        if (arrPtr != NULL) {                                                           \
                for (int n = 0; n < arrSize; n++) {                             \
                        SAFE_DELETE(arrPtr[n]);                                         \
                }                                                                                               \
                delete arrPtr;                                                                  \
                arrPtr = NULL;                                                                  \
        }                                                                                                       \
} while (0)

#define SAFE_REPLACE ( dst,
src   ) 

Value:

do {                                            \
        SAFE_DELETE(dst);                                                                       \
        dst = src;                                                                                      \
} while (0)
